# Psychic Homily

> Community-driven live music calendar for Arizona and the Southwest US.

Psychic Homily is a free platform for discovering upcoming live music shows, venues, and artists in the Arizona music scene and beyond. Shows are submitted by the community and curated by admins.

## What you can find here

- Upcoming live music shows with dates, venues, artists, prices, and age requirements
- Venue profiles with addresses, upcoming show schedules, and links
- Artist profiles with bios, social links (Spotify, Bandcamp, Instagram), and upcoming performances
- Music blog posts and DJ set mixes

## How to access show data

### Web pages (with schema.org MusicEvent structured data)
- Browse all upcoming shows: https://psychichomily.com/shows
- Individual show pages have full JSON-LD MusicEvent markup
- Sitemap: https://psychichomily.com/sitemap.xml

### Public API (no authentication required)
- Upcoming shows: GET https://api.psychichomily.com/shows/upcoming?limit=50
- Filter by city: GET https://api.psychichomily.com/shows/upcoming?city=Phoenix&state=AZ
- Multi-city filter: GET https://api.psychichomily.com/shows/upcoming?cities=Phoenix,AZ|Tucson,AZ
- All venues: GET https://api.psychichomily.com/venues
- All artists: GET https://api.psychichomily.com/artists
- Venue cities: GET https://api.psychichomily.com/venues/cities
- Show cities: GET https://api.psychichomily.com/shows/cities

### Response format
Show responses include: event date, title, city, state, venue (name, address), artists (name, headliner status), age requirement, price, ticket URL, sold out status, and SEO-friendly slug.

## Coverage

- Primary: Phoenix, Mesa, Tempe, Scottsdale, Chandler, Tucson (Arizona)
- Expanding: Chicago venues (The Empty Bottle)
- Shows are updated daily via community submissions and automated venue discovery

## Optional: detailed reference

- llms-full.txt: https://psychichomily.com/llms-full.txt
